name: Harvest Havoc
description:
Welcome to the heart-pounding world of 'Harvest Havoc' where multiplayer PvP meets a thrilling farming-themed extravaganza. Gather your friends and dive into this chaotic 2-6 player party game, where you'll become master farmers, sowing seeds, harvesting bountiful crops, and peddling your produce for victory.

But the true twist lies in the heart of the arenas, where chaos reigns supreme. Engage in ferocious battles with fists or grow formidable weaponry. 'Harvest Havoc' is a unique fusion of cultivation and chaotic combat, promising intense and unpredictable gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Who will emerge as the ultimate farmer-warrior in this wild and exhilarating experience?

Features:

  • 5 wacky characters to choose from
  • 5 unique levels with varied mechanics, crops, and weapons
  • 3 alternate game modes
  • Teams and Free-For-All modes
  • Challenge your friends online or over LAN
  • Fun chaotic gameplay
